Hearbeat(bytes32).details: The event is emitted when a heartbeat is sent.

params.ticketId: The ticketId of the L2->L1 message.

MessageSent(bytes).details: Relayers watch for these events to construct merkle proofs to execute transactions on Ethereum.

params.nodeData: The data to create leaves in the merkle tree. abi.encodePacked(msgId, to, data), outbox relays to.call(data)

params.stateRoot: The receiving domain encoded message data.

SnapshotSent(uint256,bytes32).details: The event is emitted when a snapshot through the canonical arbiturm bridge.

params.ticketId: The ticketId of the L2->L1 message.

params._epochPeriod: The duration in seconds between epochs.

saveSnapshot().details: Snapshots can be saved a maximum of once per epoch.

sendMessage(address,bytes4,bytes).details: Sends an arbitrary message to a receiving chain.

params.fnSelector: The function selector of the receiving contract.
params.to: The address of the contract on the receiving chain which receives the calldata.

returns._0: msgId The zero based index of the message in the inbox.

sendSnapshot(uint256).details: Sends the state root snapshot using Arbitrum's canonical bridge.

params.epochSend: The epoch of the snapshot requested to send.

SnapshotSaved(bytes32).notice: The bridgers watch this event to claim the stateRoot on the veaOutbox. The epoch (not emitted) is determined by block.timestamp / epochPeriod.

userdoc.notice: Vea Bridge Inbox From Arbitrum to Ethereum.
